name: AXBrailleMapRenderer
desc: The interface for providing data for a braille map.

items.name: var accessibilityBrailleMapRenderRegion: CGRect
items.desc: A region of the UI that the system converts into a braille map and displays on the braille display.

items.name: var accessibilityBrailleMapRenderer: (AXBrailleMap) -> Void
items.desc: A handler that the system calls to let you update the Braille map.
